name: MSCRMCreatePatch
description: Creates an unmanaged CRM Solution Patch
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: uniqueName
inputs.label: Parent Solution Unique Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique name of the parent solution you want to create a patch from

inputs.name: displayName
inputs.label: Patch Display Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The display name of the patch solution. If blank the display name of the parent base solution will be used.

inputs.name: versionNumber
inputs.label: Patch Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format:[major.minor.build.release]. The version number of the patch. If blank a default version will be assigned with an incremented build revision

inputs.name: crmConnectionTimeout
inputs.label: Crm Connection Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Crm connection timeout in seconds

OutputVariables.name: PATCH_SOLUTION_NAME
OutputVariables.description: The unique name of the patch soluton created
